content: make 1 right leaning knit stitch 13 15 sts remain on each needle cut the m1rp - make 1 right leaning purl stitch yarn and graft the toe p - purl p2tog - purl 2 sts together rhn - right hand needle round s - round s finishing rs - right side soak the socks in lukewarm water remove sl - slip excess water by rolling the socks inside a ssk - slip slip knit towel let dry flat or on sock blockers weave st s - stitches in the ends ws - wrong side chart c chart b chart key lady of kensington socks page 4/5 alternative stranded colourwork charts for light mc and dark cc chart a2 chart d2 chart key lady of kensington socks page 5/5
